name: The Circus of Invalids
description:
The Circus of Invalids is having a Clown Quality Control (CQC) disaster! The Clown-o-matic has produced hundreds of faulty, idiot clowns, and it's your job to filter out the clowns, so only the best ones can make it to showtime!

This is a short puzzle game inspired by Lemmings, and made for a second year project in Games Design. The game is fairly simple and asset-light, but designed as more of an experiment and practice in games design than a fully completed product. Nonetheless, I hope you enjoy, and let me know what you think!
